title: Relative velocity - comparing three cars in motion

content.question: Three cars traveling on a straight two-lane road are located at the positions shown in the figure. The speeds and directions of the cars <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>, <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, and <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn></math> relative to the ground are <math alttext="v sub 1 equals 20 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext><mo>/</mo><mtext>s</mtext></math> to the east, <math alttext="v sub 2 equals 25 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>25</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></math> to the east, and <math alttext="v sub 3 equals 15 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>15</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></math> to the west, respectively. The relative velocity of Car <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> with respect to Car <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> is <math alttext="v sub 2 1, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>21</mn></msub></math>, the relative velocity of Car <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn></math> with respect to Car <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> is <math alttext="v sub 3 2, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>32</mn></msub></math>, and the relative velocity of Car <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn></math> with respect to Car <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> is <math alttext="v sub 3 1, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>31</mn></msub></mstyle></math>. Which of the following correctly ranks the magnitudes of the relative velocities?
